mapper.select: SELECT i.edcts_ist_no, i.edcts_ist_dt, i.edcts_ist_cnt, i.edcts_cd, i.edcts_lot_no, e.prdt_nm FROM edcts_ist i JOIN edcts e ON i.edcts_cd = e.edcts_cd WHERE i.edcts_ist_dt BETWEEN #{edctsIstDtStart} AND #{edctsIstDtEnd}
SELECT DISTINCT p.order_no, p.edcts_lot_no, p.edcts_cd, o.prdt_nm, p.insp_cnt FROM PRDT_INSP p JOIN ORDER_SHEET o ON p.order_no = o.order_no WHERE o.PROG_APPE = '검사완료'
